name: Caviarsoft
tagline: Build High Quality Web & Mobile Apps
description: Caviarsoft designs and builds high-quality web and mobile applications. We believe in user-centred design and rigorous engineering standards. We take an open and friendly approach in all that we do. Working directly with clients in a B2B relationship, we deliver custom web and mobile applications that help their businesses succeed. We also work in partnership with other design and digital agencies who require specialist IT skills to fulfill their client briefs.
